title: Replace all contact email addresses site-wide with SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com

requirements.text: Search the entire frontend project for any existing email address text (including, but not limited to, the Contact page, Footer, and About page) and replace every occurrence with exactly: SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com. Only update the email text itself; do not change any layout, styling, component structure, routes, tools, calculators, or page content beyond the email strings.

quotes:
Search the entire project and find any existing contact email text.
The email may appear in Contact page, Footer, or About section.

Replace ALL existing email addresses with:
SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com

Do NOT ask for file names.
Automatically locate the file and update only the email text.
Do not change layout, tools, calculators, or design.

acceptanceCriteria: All email addresses displayed anywhere in the UI are exactly "SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com".
No other email-like strings remain in the codebase UI content (e.g., previous addresses such as "contact@sankalphub.com" or "business@sankalphub.com" are fully removed/replaced).
No non-email text, layout, styling, navigation, tools, or calculator functionality is changed as part of this update.

constraints: Do not ask the user for file names; automatically locate and update occurrences in the codebase.
Update only email-address text; do not modify layout, design, tools, calculators, routing, or any other content.
Frontend immutablePaths must not be edited (compose existing UI components instead).
nonGoals: Adding new contact methods (phone/WhatsApp/Telegram) or new sections/pages.
Changing any navigation labels, routes, tool implementations, calculator logic, or styling.
